name: Game Gen - Gun Fight
description:
Controls:
P1-
W, A, S, D - Move
Q, E - Point Down/Up
R - Shoot

P2-
I, J, K, L - Move
O, U - Point Down/Up
Y - Shoot

Gun Fight, like the classic arcade game, is a western set showndown style of game where the Sheriff and Outlaw players have 6 shots and aim to hit the other first. In my take of it, the guns instead are cork guns, shooting corks instead of bullets.

These corks can be re-used, if you hit a cactus, it'll drop on the floor and be able to be picked up, by either player. This also means the other player can pick up your dropped cork.

A new round begins when either player is hit, or when the time runs out, and the winner is decided on the first to 10 points.
